title: Does the nature of water change?
text: As the Nozzle uses no external air and has the capacity to create UFB from the air present in the water itself, please be assured that sending water through UFB Dualâ„¢ will NOT alter the quality, purity, Ph or any other attributes of the water. This valve converts the air components contained in water into UFB without including outside air or electricity or any other outside influences which can cause contamination.
